name: Locinox
description: Locinox develops and manufactures fittings for fencing and gates. Our vision is for every high-quality fence to have a gate with at least one Locinox component fitted in it. Our expertise is with hardware for outdoors. That niche market may not be big, but we would like to be the very best at it internationally. At the moment we are assuming a leading role and we want to keep that role and even further expand it. That is why we keep investing in this market.
